We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list. Class is GitlabOAuthProvider. It likely handles OAuth authentication with GitLab, providing token and user info. So summary: class encapsulates OAuth flow for GitLab, storing token and user info, providing accessors. Business intent: integrate GitLab authentication into application, retrieve access token and user details. Keywords: OAuth, GitLab, authentication, token, user info, provider, integration, API.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. So avoid "get_token" etc. Use generic terms. Provide JSON.assistantfinal{
